name: electron-svelte-esbuild-template
description: A starter kit to build cross-platform desktop apps with Electron, Svelte and Esbuild
author: @JeffProd

scripts.dev: concurrently 'node esbuild.js dev' 'cd electron/ && yarn run dev'
scripts.buildlinux: node esbuild.js prod && cd electron/ && yarn run buildlinux
scripts.buildwindows: node esbuild.js prod && cd electron/ && yarn run buildwindows
